name: TC014 – Validating ‘Please enter valid email’ message on incorrect email format in Forgot Password popup
description:
**Test Type**  
Functional and cross-browser testing

**Test Scenario**  
Will type in the invalid email and move on to the next field and check the visibility of **Valid email is required** text displayed or not

**Input data**
Email: cpktnwt

**Test passes if**
The **Valid email is required** text is displayed.

steps.name: Checking the visibility of email field and entering invalid email
Checking the visibility of the new password field and clicking on it
Checking the visibility of the **Valid email is required** text is displayed
